channel.title: Keywords on Applied Data Science & Artificial Intelligence
channel.description: Recent content in Keywords on Applied Data Science & Artificial Intelligence

item.title: Bayesian statistics
item.description: Example terms related to Bayesian statistics: Markov models, Montecarlo sampling and variational inference.

item.title: Causal inference
item.description: Example terms related to Causal inference: Intervention and counterfactual models.

item.title: Computational intelligence
item.description: Example terms related to Computational intelligence: Genetic programming,Evolutionary computation and bio-inspired computation.

item.title: Control theory
item.description: Example terms related to Control theory: Optimal and constrained control.

item.title: Data mining
item.description: Example terms related to Data mining: Stream mining, Process mining

item.title: Deep learning
item.description: Example terms related to Deep learning: Convolutional models, autoencoders, generative models and transformers.

item.title: Dynamical systems
item.description: Example terms related to Dynamical systems: Differential equations, stochastic processes and hybrid systems.

item.title: Explanaible Artificial Intelligence
item.description: Example terms related to Explanaible Artificial Intelligence: Bias detection, explanation of black-box models, formal methods in AI

item.title: Frequentist statistics
item.description: Example terms related to Frequentist statistics: Null hypothesis, multiple-testing, false discovery and familywise error rates.

item.title: High performance computing
item.description: Example terms related to High performance computing: Scientific computing and numerical algorithms.

item.title: Linear programming
item.description: Example terms related to Linear programming: Continuous and integer linear programming,

item.title: Network analysis
item.description: Example terms related to Network analysis: Graph theory.

item.title: Optimization
item.description: Example terms related to Optimization: Non-convex optimisation, gradient descent and submodular functions.

item.title: Probabilistic graphical models
item.description: Example terms related to Probabilistic graphical models: Hierarchical and latent-variables models.

item.title: Reinforcement learning
item.description: Example terms related to Reinforcement learning: Multi-agent RL, safe RL, constrained RL, adversarial RL

item.title: Robust machine learning
item.description: Example terms related to Robust machine learning: adversarial learning, constrained learning, meta-learning

item.title: Supervised Learning
item.description: Example terms related to Supervised Learning: Regression models; survival analysis

item.title: Theory of algorithms
item.description: Example terms related to Theory of algorithms: Computational complexity and computability.

item.title: Unsupervised learning
item.description: Example terms related to Unsupervised learning: Clustering, dimensionality reduction
